analysis.description:
ERC20Basic.totalSupply (/unique_chucks/24/0xe59015e2d097b545f0b1701c64310f98e3600495.sol#43) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- mint (/unique_chucks/24/0xe59015e2d097b545f0b1701c64310f98e3600495.sol#389-396)
empty in ERC23PayableToken.transfer (/unique_chucks/24/0xe59015e2d097b545f0b1701c64310f98e3600495.sol#348-350) is a local variable never initialiazed

TokenSale.finalize has external calls inside a loop:
	- contributors[x].transfer(amountToReturn) (/unique_chucks/24/0xe59015e2d097b545f0b1701c64310f98e3600495.sol#584-585)

Reentrancy in TokenSale.buy (/unique_chucks/24/0xe59015e2d097b545f0b1701c64310f98e3600495.sol#499-524):
	External calls:
	- tokens = getTokensAmountUnderCap(amount) (/unique_chucks/24/0xe59015e2d097b545f0b1701c64310f98e3600495.sol#505)
	- token.mint(to,tokens) (/unique_chucks/24/0xe59015e2d097b545f0b1701c64310f98e3600495.sol#509-510)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- contributions (/unique_chucks/24/0xe59015e2d097b545f0b1701c64310f98e3600495.sol#520-523)
	- contributors (/unique_chucks/24/0xe59015e2d097b545f0b1701c64310f98e3600495.sol#519)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/24/0xe59015e2d097b545f0b1701c64310f98e3600495.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/24/0xe59015e2d097b545f0b1701c64310f98e3600495.sol#1): it allows old versions
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/24/0xe59015e2d097b545f0b1701c64310f98e3600495.sol#14-17): it allows old versions
